entry.title: The IOT Answer is the Hub
entry.content:
Steve Gibson said this on a recent episode of Security Now. He says, the solution to the IOT security problem is the hub.

He goes on to point out that all IOT (Internet of things) devices should connect to a single device in your home that responsibly handles the communications and security.

Recently, poorly secured, home IOT devices have been credited with being the medium for massive scale denial of service (DOS) attacks against well-known web sites. The flood of cheap and inexpensive devices like home cameras, wifi-enabled light bulbs, into homes with very fast outbound network connections have enabled a huge force that can be used that want to engage in digital vandalism to those who want to bring a site under a full attack.
